description: This file implements the management functions for TLS session objects, including functions to get, add, delete, and delete all sessions within a TLS Session Manager. It interacts with session entries via locking and hashing, suggesting its role as a core component in TLS session management.

classes.name: TLS_SESSION_MANAGER_OBJECT
classes.description: Represents the TLS Session Manager that handles session lifecycle and lookup.

classes.name: TLS_SESSION_ENTRY_OBJECT
classes.description: Represents a single TLS session entry containing session details and management functions.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE TlsSmoGetSession(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG host_id,ULONG peer_id,PUCHAR session_id,ULONG session_id_size)
methods.description: Retrieves a TLS session entry matching specified host ID, peer ID, and session ID.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsSmoAddSession(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSession)
methods.description: Adds a new TLS session entry to the manager, indexing by peer ID.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsSmoDelSession(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG host_id,ULONG peer_id,PUCHAR session_id,ULONG session_id_size)
methods.description: Deletes a specific TLS session entry identified by host ID, peer ID, and session ID.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsSmoDelAllSessions(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Removes all TLS session entries managed by the session manager.
